version_description:
- Added a new indicator, DeMarker. This indicator measures the demand for the underlying instrument by comparing the most recent price action to the previous period's price.

Subscribers of our "Full Access" Tier will have full access to this indicator at no additional cost.
- Performance improvements
- Added a new RSI indicator with a lower period settings (7).

- App now opens at the last tool you used in the Dashboard app.

Do also check out the new indicators that we added in the past few weeks.

1) Pinbar. The pin bar formation is a price action reversal pattern that shows that a certain level or price point in the market was rejected.
2) EMA Cross. Identify golden and death crosses of multiple instruments across different timeframes. The death cross and the golden cross are technical indicators that traders use to predict bearish and bullish market momentum, respectively.
3) RSI (7). Your favourite RSI indicator with a lower time period of 7.

- We have received numerous requests over the past year to include a paid subscription for an ad-free version. We are pleased to announce that this option will be available in this update. Simply choose the "Remove All Ads" option at the side menu to enable this option.
- We have just added a brand new EMA Crossover indicator that uses the 5, 20 periods. This is suitable for traders who are into shorter term trading.

Localised app for 8 new languages
- Chinese (Simplified)
- Chinese (Traditional)
- Italian
- Spanish
- Russian
- Indonesian
- Malay
- Vietnamese

- Added a new indicator, Money Flow Index (MFI). The MFI is an oscillator that uses both price and volume to measure buying and selling pressure,
- Fixed some Russian localisation issues
- Several performance improvements. Kindly update to this version for the best user experience.

- Introducing the biggest feature update since the launch of this app. Alerts+ is an advanced alert management tool that allows you to create fully customisable alerts. Yes, that includes key settings such as the period of the indicator. No longer do you need to use the standard indicator settings for alert creation. Please note that Alerts+ feature is only available via subscription.

- Minor bug fixes

v3
- Introducing the biggest feature update since the launch of this app. Alerts+ is an advanced alert management tool that allows you to create fully customisable alerts. Yes, that includes key settings such as the period of the indicator. No longer do you need to use the standard indicator settings for alert creation. Please note that Alerts+ feature is only available via subscription.
- MACD Center and Signal line crossover indicators added to the Alerts+ tool. You can now customise the settings of the MACD indicator instead of using the standard settings of 12, 26, 9.
- Momentum indicator is added to the Alerts+ tool. You can now customise the period of the Momentum indicator instead of using the standard period of 10.

- Bollinger Band Crossover indicator is added to the Alerts+ tool. You can customise the period, standard deviation and the type of Moving Average for the Bollinger Band Crossover indicator. A notification will be sent when the price crosses below the lower band or above the upper band.
- Number of free alerts is now 3 instead of 1. Created alerts will expire in 5 days (unless otherwise stated) for free users.

- PSAR indicator is added to the Alerts+ tool. You can customise the acceleration and maximum of PSAR. In addition, an ADX indicator is also added to filter potential false signal generated. The ADX indicator is also fully customisable and you can set your preferred period and the strength of the ADX to act as a filter. Alerts will only be sent when PSAR signal is generated with a ADX value greater than your preferred target.

Note: Number of free alerts for the Alerts+ tool is now 3 instead of 1. Created alerts will expire in 5 days (unless otherwise stated) for free users.

- Bug fixes and performance improvements

Previously on 3.4

- PSAR indicator is added to the Alerts+ tool. You can customise the acceleration and maximum of PSAR. In addition, an ADX indicator is also added to filter potential false signal generated. The ADX indicator is also fully customisable and you can set your preferred period and the strength of the ADX to act as a filter. Alerts will only be sent when PSAR signal is generated with a ADX value greater than your preferred target.
- Added Bollinger Band Crossover indicator to the Dashboard tool.

- Minor text fix

V3.5
- Added Bollinger Band Crossover indicator to the Dashboard tool.
- Overbought / oversold values for CCI alerts in Alerts+ tool can now be set from 200 to -200
- Performance improvements

- Default home screen option now available on the More tab. This allows you to set your preferred tool to launch when you open the app.
- Library view is now available on the Settings page, allowing you to have quick access to all instrument for a particular indicator.

- We are delighted to add a new tool called Daily Top Movers to our app. In the Daily Top Movers screen, you can get a feeling of which currencies are having the biggest move. In addition, you can compare the list of top movers of the current bar to that of the previous bars to see if the movements are extending.
- Minor bug fixes including crash issues for some users using the Strategies tool.
- Added Aroon indicator to our Alerts+ tool. You can now customise the period used to generate the Aroon signal.
- Added Aroon and StochRSI indicator to our Alerts+ tool. You can now customise the parameters used to generate these signals.

- You can now disable/enable the custom alerts in the Alerts+ tool without deleting them.

v3.9.0
- Added Aroon and StochRSI indicator to our Alerts+ tool. You can now customise the parameters used to generate these signals.

- Fixed crash issue when creating a MACD Center custom alert.
- Fixed issue with the customisation of parameters for MACD Center and Signal Crossover

v3.9
- You can now disable/enable the custom alerts in the Alerts+ tool without deleting them.
- Added Aroon and StochRSI indicator to our Alerts+ tool. You can now customise the parameters used to generate these signals.
- Added Bitcoin (BTCUSD) to the Alerts+ tool. You can now choose Bitcoin when creating a new custom alert.
- Add new alert feature (full access available via subscription) for Currency Strength tool

- Fixed issue with restoring purchases on a new device,
- Added new alert feature (full access available via subscription) for Currency Strength tool

- Added the Engulfing Patterns indicator which identifies and alerts you whenever a bearish or bullish engulfing pattern is formed. The Engulfing candlestick setup has a strong reversal character. If the price is increasing and an Engulfing pattern is created on the way up, this gives us a signal that a top might be forming now. The opposite is in force too. If the price is decreasing and an Engulfing pattern appears on the chart, this suggests that the price action might be forming a bottom.
- We have added the Engulfing Patterns indicator which identifies and alerts you whenever a bearish or bullish engulfing pattern is formed to our Alerts+ tool.

- Performance improvements

v3.12.0
- We have added the Engulfing Patterns indicator which identifies and alerts you whenever a bearish or bullish engulfing pattern is formed to our Alerts+ tool.
- You can now tag your preferred indicators and instruments as favourites and they will appear on the top.
- Added US30 to the list of supported indices
- Updated the interface of Alerts and Alerts+
- The custom period parameter has now being increased to 200 (Previously it was 65).
- Added Awesome Oscillator Zero Line Crossover. The Awesome Oscillator is an indicator that attempts to gauge whether bearish or bullish forces are currently driving the market.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Updated alert tone for Currency Strength
- Performance improvements
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
- Performance improvements and some minor UI updates

- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements,
- Removal of bitcoin support for Alerts+ tool.
- Added exotic pair support for most of our indicators. This will be available for all our subscribers.

- Minor UI updates

v4.9.0
- Added exotic pair support for most of our indicators. This will be available for all our subscribers.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Minor bug fixes and performance enhancements,
- Interface update for Alerts+ tool for better user experience.

- Added the following new instrument to the Alerts+ Tool for technical analysis
* Bitcoin
* Bitcoin Cash
* Ethereum
* Litecoin
* Ripple
* Palladium
